spell_tooltip.description: Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 373,076 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Kick upwards, dealing 376,557 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 40%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 34,102 Nature damage or 74,994 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger also spawns a White Tiger Statue at your location that pulses 50,470 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 20% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 720,178 Physical damage to your primary target and 388,896 damage to all other enemies over 3.4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.

Fists of Fury's damage is increased by 100% of your haste and Fists of Fury does 10% more damage each time it deals damage, resetting when Fists of Fury ends.

Your auto attack speed is increased by 60% for 8 sec after Fists of Fury ends.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 459,376 and dealing 10% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.
Rising Sun Kick increases the damage your target receives from you by 3% for 12 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.
Blackout Kick critical strike chance increased by 10% and critical damage increased by 18%.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.
Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 30% and its radius is increased by 15%.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 12% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 259,700 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.

Whenever you deal damage to a target with Fists of Fury, you gain a stack of Chi Energy up to a maximum of 30 stacks.

Using Spinning Crane Kick will cause the energy to detonate in a Chi Explosion, dealing 170,793 Nature damage to all enemies within 8 yards, reduced beyond 5 targets. The damage is increased by 5% for each stack of Chi Energy.
The Blackout Kick! effect also increases the damage of your next Blackout Kick by 350%.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.
Each successive attack that triggers Combo Strikes in a row grants 1% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Spending Chi has a chance to make your next Spinning Crane Kick free and deal an additional 200% damage.

During Storm, Earth, and Fire, Chi costs are reduced by 1 and Blackout Kick reduces the cooldown of affected abilities by an additional 1 sec. 

Activating Storm, Earth, and Fire resets the remaining cooldown of Rising Sun Kick and grants 2 Chi.
Strike with both fists at all enemies in front of you, dealing 1.1 million Physical damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.
When you consume Blackout Kick!, you have a 100% chance to generate 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.

Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 20 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 0.9 sec with Tiger Lightning for 25,982 Nature damage.

Every 4 sec, Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning dealing 8% of the damage you have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.

Strike of the Windlord summons a whirling tornado around you, causing 436,235 Physical damage over 11.1 sec to all enemies within 9 yards. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
You have a 100% chance to gain Blackout Kick! after consuming Dance of Chi-Ji.
You gain 15% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Targets hit by Strike of the Windlord have a 100% chance to be struck for 10% additional Nature damage from your spells and abilities for 10 sec.

Performs a devastating whirling upward strike, dealing 451,700 damage to all nearby enemies and an additional 290,043 damage to the first target struck. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Only usable while both Fists of Fury and Rising Sun Kick are on cooldown.
Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger's damage is increased by 30% and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
Strike of the Windlord's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its damage is increased by 100%.
Whirling Dragon Punch has a 100% chance to activate Dance of Chi-Ji and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.

Envelop yourself in razor-sharp winds, then lunge forward dealing 850,171 Nature damage to enemies in your path. Damage reduced beyond 5 enemies.

Hold to increase lunge distance.

The August Celestials empower you, causing you to radiate 5.2 million Nature damage onto enemies and 515,630 healing onto up to 5 injured allies within 15 yds over 3.4 sec, split evenly among them. Healing and damage increased by 6% per enemy struck, up to 30%.

You may move while channeling, but casting other healing or damaging spells cancels this effect.
Fists of Fury and Spinning Crane Kick deal 10% more damage.

Tiger Palm has a chance to cause Xuen to claw your target for 320,237 Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 25% of the damage done.

Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger guarantees your next cast activates this effect.
Gain Rushing Jade Wind while Xuen, the White Tiger is active.

Strike of the Windlord calls upon Yu'lon to decrease the cooldown time of Fists of Fury, Strike of the Windlord, Rising Sun Kick, Flying Serpent Kick, and Whirling Dragon Punch by 75% for 6 sec. 

The channel time of Fists of Fury is reduced by 50% while Yu'lon is active.

After Xuen assists you, your next Blackout Kick refunds 2 stacks of Teachings of the Monastery and causes Niuzao to stomp at your target's location, dealing 189,770 damage to nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Rushing Jade Wind and Spinning Crane Kick have a chance to cause Chi-Ji to increase your energy regeneration by 20% for 6 sec and quickly rush to 5 enemies, dealing 189,770 Physical damage to each target struck.

You heal for 10% of your maximum health instantly when you activate Celestial Conduit and receive 15% less damage for its duration. 

This effect lingers for an additional 8 sec after Celestial Conduit ends.
Your movement speed is increased by 75% during Celestial Conduit and by 15% for 3 sec after being assisted by any Celestial.

You switch between alignments after an August Celestial assists you, increasing a corresponding secondary stat by 2%.

Crane Stance:
Haste

Tiger Stance:
Critical Strike

Ox Stance:
Versatility

Serpent Stance: 
Mastery

Celestial Conduit can be recast once during its duration to call upon all of the August Celestials to assist you at 200% effectiveness.

Unity Within is automatically cast when Celestial Conduit ends if not used before expiration.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 379,551 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Kick upwards, dealing 369,653 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 34,788 Nature damage or 73,328 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Your auto attack speed is increased by 60% for 8 sec after Fists of Fury ends.

 Expel Harm

When you consume Blackout Kick!, you have a 100% chance to generate 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.

Every 4 sec, Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning dealing 8% of the damage you have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

You gain 15% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.

Only usable while both Fists of Fury and Rising Sun Kick are on cooldown.

Hold to increase lunge distance.
Fists of Fury and Spinning Crane Kick deal 10% more damage.

Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger guarantees your next cast activates this effect.
Gain Rushing Jade Wind while Xuen, the White Tiger is active.

The channel time of Fists of Fury is reduced by 50% while Yu'lon is active.

Rushing Jade Wind and Spinning Crane Kick have a chance to cause Chi-Ji to increase your energy regeneration by 20% for 6 sec and quickly rush to 5 enemies, dealing 189,770 Physical damage to each target struck.

This effect lingers for an additional 8 sec after Celestial Conduit ends.
Your movement speed is increased by 75% during Celestial Conduit and by 15% for 3 sec after being assisted by any Celestial.

Haste

Tiger Stance:
Critical Strike

Ox Stance:
Versatility

Serpent Stance: 
Mastery

Celestial Conduit can be recast once during its duration to call upon all of the August Celestials to assist you at 200% effectiveness.

Unity Within is automatically cast when Celestial Conduit ends if not used before expiration.
Demateralize into mist while stunned, reducing damage taken by 30%. Each second you remain stunned reduces this bonus by 10%.
Heals the target for 1 million over 6.8 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Kick upwards, dealing 365,112 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 376,347 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 40%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 212,625 Nature damage to all enemies, and 218,331 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
The duration of snare effects on you is reduced by 20%.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 0.6% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 6%.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 20% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 368,775 over 6 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 30%.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 300,584 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.5 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 219,149 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.
Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 4.7 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.4 sec to restore 44,625 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 120,251, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 92. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 97.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.3 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
The absorb amount of Life Cocoon is increased by 80%.
Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 149,565 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 25 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 97, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
After you fully consume Thunder Focus Tea, your next Vivify triggers Zen Pulse.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 121,270 over 6 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 2.3 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 2 nearby allies for 132,023 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 8 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec that increases your movement speed by 20% while inside, dealing 39,108 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 80,249 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path. Up to 5 enemies caught in the path suffer an additional 61,669 damage.
Chi Cocoons now apply Enveloping Mist for 4 sec when they expire or are consumed, and Chi-Ji's Gusts of Mists healing is increased by 20% and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by 500%.
Casting Thunder Focus Tea increases your next Crackling Jade Lightning's damage by 2,000% and causes it to chain to 4 additional enemies at 25% effectiveness.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

After casting Jadefire Stomp or Thunder Focus Tea, Ancient Teachings transfers an additional 215% damage to healing for 15 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 8% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility

Each time you cast Sheilun's Gift, you learn one of Shaohao's Lessons for up to 30 sec, with the duration based on how many clouds of mist are consumed.

Lesson of Doubt: Your spells and abilities deal up to 40% more healing and damage to targets, based on their current health.

Lesson of Despair: Your Critical Strike is increased by 30% while above 50% health.

Lesson of Fear: Decreases your damage taken by 15% and increases your Haste by 20%.

Lesson of Anger: 25% of the damage or healing you deal is duplicated every 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 23,023, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 50% increased damage and healing.
When Aspect of Harmony ends, any remaining vitality is expelled as healing over 8 sec, split among nearby targets.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 3%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Thunder Focus Tea has 1 additional charge.
When cast on yourself, your single-target healing spells heal for 10% more and restore an additional 142,505 health over 6 sec.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 15% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Vivify stores 91,350 vitality, increased based on your recent Gusts of Mist.

When Aspect of Harmony heals, it has a chance to spread to a nearby ally. When you directly heal an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.
